_header: Mayest thou now be glad with all thy fresh array
Title(s): A Mirror for Young Ladies at their Toilet
_description: A Mirror for Young Ladies at their Toilet; an acrostic — three 5-line stanzas (abbba)

BLHar116.First Lines:
Maist thou now be glade with all thi fresshe arayOne me to loke
                    that wyll dystene thi face…
BLHar116.Last Lines:
…I smyte I fle I woll graunte no manne graceA ryse a wake
                    amend here while thou may
BLHar116.Note:
Acrostic warning of death, three 5-line stanzas rhyming abbba baaab
                    abbba, preceded by a French couplet, ‘Test le myrroure pur lez Iofenes
                        Dames a regardir / and maytyn pure lour testes b (?v)ealiunt
                    adressere’; ends, ‘Explicit’.
